description:
CryptoBexchange is a brand new forward thinking blockchain project that will create one site with three parts;

Cryptocurrency exchange
Online sports betting
Online casino

We see this as a huge gap in the market that we plan to capitalise on. Currently, there are cryptocurrency exchanges, cryptocurrency betting sites and cryptocurrency casino sites. However, there is no all-in-one trusted site for these activities, and that’s where CryptoBexchange comes in.

CryptoBexchange will have its own cryptocurrency, CBEX. CBEX will be used essentially to power all three elements of the business model. From purchasing and holding CBEX, users will receive discounted trading and withdrawal fees on the exchange, and discounted commission on sports and casino use within the site.
name: CBEX Token
